pages.title: Faster Smelting
pages.text: you can find fiery dogs in the $(thing)Nether$()? If you tame one and let it rest over a $(item)Furnace$(), it'll make it go faster!
Tame yourself a hot dog, and bring it back home to smelt faster.$(br2)You can tame them with $(item)Coal$(), but you'll need $(thing)Fire Resistance$() too.
